name: Ghost Bridge
description:
Optimize settings  aren't working during UE4 my packaging, so the game may not run well  on slow PC's. This optimized version has lower light quality so it should run a little better.

Controls

W = move forward

Mouse = Look around

Left click = Die

Game By Matt Seik

Music By z3r0 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD2iUVkyqfuAFvqpdWweTkw
